title: Why are humans living longer than before? - Quora

response.answer_text: Due to medical advancement and educational advancement. Modern science and technology have also helped a lot in human lifestyles. People have become more aware for their precautionary measurements to stop any disease to crop up. Earlier people were not temperate in diet. They were voracious eater. Animal instinct were more dominant in them. They were least bothered about cleanliness and hygienic measures required to be taken for curbing the proliferation of epidemic like cholera, plague etc.
